title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 409.15 - Notifications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 409.15 - Notifications

State Regulations

Any student loan servicer not required to obtain a license
under section
409.3
of this part that is required
by section
711
of the banking
law to notify the superintendent that it is servicing student loans shall make
such notification by completing the form published on the department's website
for such purpose. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
409.15

Adopted

New

York State Register October 16, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 42, eff. 10/16/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
